H0.text: which city is called the manchester of north india. Kanpur

H1.text: which city is called the manchester of north india. Ludhiana

H2.text: which city is called the manchester of north india. Amritsar

H3.text: which city is called the manchester of north india. Ahmedabad

A4.text: It is a major industrial center of Northern India, referred to as 'India's Manchester' by the BBC.

A5.text: As a result of its dominance in the textile industry it is often dubbed as the Manchester of India.
